channel.title: Forum Hosting
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I would like to intorduce something new that I will be doing with my site
well what i would like to do is host YOUR forums for just one thing to be admin on your server
it would be something like www.rs-palace.com/YOURserver here With No-Ads At all!
Our Main site is www.rs-palace.com
The requirements for this are: 1. Must be an extrememly popular server 2. 30+ people at an average online per a time
If you would like this server then please use this layout
[code] What is your forum name: What is your server:(link to it) Proof:(picture with people on showing your server name also and your name on the server) What is your MSN addy: [/code]
Thats all you have to do
Servers we host for:
